name: Kukulkan & Yamata
description:
Kukulkan & Yamata is a 2 player game which combined the classic Snake with the classic Pong.

Control: Keyboard:

Player 1(Kukulkan): wasd to move, left shift to sprint.

Player 2(Yamata): arrow keys to move, right shift to sprint.

Gamepad:

Left joystick to move, on DualShock 4 it may use O or X to move(it depends on your running platform)

Rules:

- Push the ball in to your opponent's gate!

- The first player who get 7 score would win!

- Sprint would increase your speed, yet consume your stamina. You can restore your stamina by collecting blue fire.

- Collecting red fire would increase your length.

Arts Style:

- The one on the left side, Kukulkan, which is the feathered serpent of Maya civilization.

- The one on the right side, Yamata, which is inspired by the Japanese legendary creature Yamata No Orochi(八岐大蛇).

Statement:

This game is made within two days during ISART Game Design Workshop.

Credit:

Designer: He Zhixian, Tang RuiZhe

Programmer: Tang Zerui, He Zhixian

Artist: Meng Yixuan, Jiang Ruyue, Ni Ruxin

Source Code:

You can find source code on https://github.com/igaryhe/Snoke
